original_text: And when they arose early on the morrow morning, behold, Dagon was fallen upon his face to the ground before the ark of the Lord; and the head of Dagon and both the palms of his hands were cut off upon the threshold; only the stump of Dagon was left to him.
korean_text: 그 이튿날 아침에 그들이 일찍이 일어나 본즉 다곤이 여호와의 궤 앞에서 또다시 엎드러져 얼굴이 땅에 닿았고 그 머리와 두 손목은 끊어져 문지방에 있고 다곤의 몸뚱이만 남았더라

sentences.original_text: And when they arose early on the morrow morning,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 다음 날 아침 일찍 일어났을 때,

sentences.original_text: behold, Dagon was fallen upon his face
sentences.korean_translation: 보라, 다곤이 얼굴을 땅에 대고 엎드러져 있었고

sentences.original_text: to the ground before the ark of the Lord;
sentences.korean_translation: 여호와의 언약궤 앞 땅에 엎드러져 있었다.

sentences.original_text: and the head of Dagon and both the palms of his hands were cut off
only the stump of Dagon was left to him.
